topics.body:
4kids One piece didn't suck because of the censorship.

It sucked because it completely disrespected the source material.

It talked down to kids, It removed the emotional impact of the character deaths. (Oda doesn't kill off characters for no reason.)

No character development. (Usopp wasn't allowed to be anything other than comic relief.)

And They tried to only make it silly. (That's only one side of the coin that is One piece)

I mostly copypasted the points off of some guy on youtube. But they're good points.

topics.body:
Call me crazy, but I think prostitution is still illegal due to opposition to cultural change.  A lot of countries are still stuck in the 70's where people still think stuff like stds and such can be prevented by simply pretending that it doesn't exist, but in reality pretending the spread of stds actually increases infection rates.

A funny, albeit sad, example is a school in texas had a severe chlamydiae outbreak because it had a abstinence only sex ed.

The reason why this is relevant is that even when presented with evidence that contradicts people's morals they will try to rationalize their morality as being true even when presented with evidence to the contrary.


Essentially:
"If we try to stop people from having sex that will stop stds" -> outbreak -> "Nope; that evidence is false.  I'm still right"
topics.author: 38b55cdf63616403d7560600
